docs.snippet: A Pakistani police official says a roadside bomb has struck a vehicle carrying police in the country's northwest, wounding four officers and 15 passers-by....

docs.snippet: After struggling for most of December, the Los Angeles Kings know they have some catching up to do. Sweeping a home-and-home from the first-place San Jose Sharks sure is a good start....

docs.snippet: Nearly 300 tonnes of oil spilled into the narrow strait separating Singapore and Malaysia after a collision between two container vessels, the Singapore Marine Port Authority (MPA) said on Wednesday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Nearly 300 tonnes of oil spilled into the narrow strait separating Singapore and Malaysia after a collision between two container vessels, the Singapore Marine Port Authority (MPA) said on Wednesday.

headline.main: Container Vessel Collision Causes Oil Spill on Singapore-Malaysia Border
headline.print_headline: Container Vessel Collision Causes Oil Spill on Singapore-Malaysia Border
